articles.description: B.J. Johnson throws down a big dunk for LaSalle's first points of the second half.

articles.description: The last time Georgetown played Xavier, a little more than two weeks ago, the Hoyas took the Musketeers to the limit before losing 96-91 at the Cintas Center in Cincinnati.
articles.headline: Georgetown gets another crack at No. 4 Xavier

articles.description: Tom Izzo says Michigan State played an average first half and wants to get Cassius Winston more involved in the second half.
articles.headline: Izzo hopes team can protect the ball in 2nd half
